sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REQ4600 A ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, REQ_CB_SEQ, CB_FILE_SN, CB_GB_CD, CB_CONTENT_TEXT, CB_THUM_VIEW_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(A.REQ_CB_SEQ)+1,1) FROM REQ4600 A WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ), #cbFileSn#, #cbGbCd#, #cbContentText#, #cbThumViewCd#, SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )

sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_CB_SEQ, A.CB_FILE_SN, A.CB_GB_CD, NVL(A.CB_CONTENT_TEXT,' ') AS CB_CONTENT_TEXT, A.CB_THUM_VIEW_CD, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'1') AS USR_NM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID,'1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM
FROM REQ4600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ORDER BY A.REQ_CB_SEQ DESC
SELECT NVL(MAX(CB_FILE_SN),0) AS MAX_CB_FILE_SN FROM REQ4600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#

SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_CB_SEQ, A.CB_FILE_SN, A.CB_GB_CD, NVL(A.CB_CONTENT_TEXT,' ') AS CB_CONTENT_TEXT, A.CB_THUM_VIEW_CD, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'1') AS USR_NM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID,'1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM FROM REQ4600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CB_SEQ = #reqCbSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REQ4600 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND REQ_ID = #reqId# AND REQ_CB_SEQ = #reqCbSeq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REQ4600 A SET A.CB_CONTENT_TEXT = #cbContentText# ,A.CB_THUM_VIEW_CD = #cbThumViewCd# ,A.MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CB_SEQ = #reqCbSeq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(A.REQ_CB_SEQ)+1,1) as MAX_REQ_CB_SEQ FROM REQ4600 A WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#

SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS REQ_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_ST_DU_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_ED_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , A.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO , B.USR_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , (CASE A.REQ_PRO_TYPE WHEN '04' THEN CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(REQ_ED_DTM,SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'STATUS_FAILED' ELSE 'STATUS_DONE' END ELSE CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(REQ_ED_DTM,SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'STATUS_SUSPENDED' WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM-3,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(REQ_ED_DTM,SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'STATUS_WAITING' ELSE 'STATUS_ACTIVE' END END) AS REQ_STATUS FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = B.USR_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '01' AND A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_DESC LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND B.USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_ID LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE LIKE '%'||#searchCd#||'%' AND A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM >= TO_DATE( #srchFromDt# , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM <= TO_DATE( #srchToDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REQ4100 A SET REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO = #progress# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND REQ_ID = #reqId#
